content: I think the Home view can feel a bit messy for new users to Zulip, especially for people who aren't caught up. What would folks think of having the default view (e.g. when you log in) be #announce or some other stream?
Interesting, this seems to be part of the onboarding process. Would this be a default view every time you open up Zulip?
hm, I guess I don't know what happens when you log in; I assumed we put you in Home but I don't actually know.
First time users get put into "new members" if it exists, or else "announce," and then I think finally it falls back to the Home view.
